Ok I understand that you can switch back to the old client, BUT can I make it default? Everytime I want to join league i have to press that text in the new client so it will redirect me to the old one, it's anoying to do it everytime. Can I somehow make the old client default?

> [{quoted}](name=Hi Im Shapca,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ob3AIqOG,comment-id=00000003,timestamp=2016-11-16T15:17:32.518+0000)
>
> Ok I understand that you can switch back to the old client, BUT can I make it default? Everytime I want to join league i have to press that text in the new client so it will redirect me to the old one, it's anoying to do it everytime. Can I somehow make the old client default?

1. go in your League folder to /RADS/system/
2. open the "user.cfg" file
3. change "leagueClientOptIn = yes" to "leagueClientOptIn = no" 
4. save the changes 
5. open your client with admin permission over the "lol.launcher.exe" (or the admin one) in your League folder (make a shortcut for that file)
6. profit :3

If you'd like, you can simply complete a reinstall of League using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to roll back completely to the Legacy Client. Simply start the app, check the boxes for *reinstall* and *clean uninstall*, then launch League to finish patching. You'll want to decline all offers to upgrade to the Beta and you'll be good to go!

Deleting the Icon won't change anything, but the steps below should revert you back to the Legacy Client:

>- Go to your League of Legends install folder. Default is (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) go to \RADS\system
- Locate the user.cfg file and open with notepad
- Change leagueClientOptIn = yes to leagueClientOptIn = no
- Save and launch League of Legends again.

Let me know if this worked for you, friend. :)

* Open **user.cfg** with notepad
* Change leagueClientOptIn = yes to leagueClientOptIn = no
* Save the changes, then launch League
